# Minting asset groups

## Assets created

Assets that were minted with the flag `--enable_emission` do not have a fixed supply.

To test how group key works I created two coins: `coinWithFixedSupply` and `coinWithEmission`.

```bash
docker exec -it 0ca25af25c32 tapcli assets mint \
                --type normal \
                --name coinWithFixedSupply \
                --supply 999 \
                --meta_bytes "coinWithFixedSupply by Royllo"
```

and

```bash
docker exec -it 0ca25af25c32 tapcli assets mint \
                --type normal \
                --name coinWithEmission \
                --supply 999 \
                --meta_bytes "coinWithEmission by Royllo" \
                --enable_emission true
```

To emit the Bitcoin transaction creating our asset, run:

```bash
docker exec -it 0ca25af25c32 \
                tapcli assets mint finalize
```

Then I emit another coin with the same group key as `coinWithEmission`

To increase the supply of such an asset, we will need its `tweaked_group_key`.

```bash
docker exec -it 0ca25af25c32 tapcli assets mint \
                --type normal \
                --name coinWithEmissionNext \
                --supply 1 \
                --meta_bytes "coinWithEmissionNext by Royllo" \
                --group_key 02cb0cb321ba20816b7450ae6eb309839770f3dc41529664124f8983ca11a6932b
```

GROUP_KEY is tweaked_group_key of `coinWithEmission` asset!

```bash
docker exec -it 0ca25af25c32 \
                tapcli assets mint finalize
```

## Results

### coinWithFixedSupply

coinWithFixedSupply asset id is: `5acacf6d727bcf9e4498fa32e50e3d4aae4a560de2b663f51cb3acc2b69c8c10` (asset_group is
null). Initial script key is: `025d615b377761a5bfcfe84f0f11afd35837a68f702dd8a0cac0a2a4052b20d211`

Proof is:

```
{
    "raw_proof_file": "",
    "genesis_point": ""
}
```

### coinWithEmission

coinWithEmission asset id is: `99c728253b97423ea5d4c170d9503fa6a1d16f637cd24006e23ff756f7d7d3a1`
Initial script key is: `02368d08b148b5a0867e38a1187f9fb4ab0a36c21159502e701beafc8cdda1dec9`

```
"asset_group": {
    "raw_group_key": "02cb0cb321ba20816b7450ae6eb309839770f3dc41529664124f8983ca11a6932b",
    "tweaked_group_key": "0208e2998bfdf634b3de73de00bd1f4cc350c95fd2c7fd25e8e82338a1e3f882e1",
    "asset_witness": "0140eacf7c746b8e6630aad9da1aaa480def14e35a3d0ae69f98e201d62b67f98241e877e19d2254f837629497dc5a91f8f3afed8b43eeb1276322b209db2558fa3c"
}
```

Proof is:

```
{
"raw_proof_file": "",
"genesis_point": ""
}
```

coinWithEmissionNext asset id is: `aad9ba8326f91e592acbc61b18c0ce7a826f24c6c55517822b1b2d1b5ae48104`
Initial script key is: `02c8c3e030404c7f117a62aeebca5926a1693f917121465938cc5f215a8a3dc7e1`

```
"asset_group": {
    "raw_group_key": "02cb0cb321ba20816b7450ae6eb309839770f3dc41529664124f8983ca11a6932b",
    "tweaked_group_key": "0208e2998bfdf634b3de73de00bd1f4cc350c95fd2c7fd25e8e82338a1e3f882e1",
    "asset_witness": "01409927b3bc349746fbc8441a473d9281cf26176826fb42e24040efaba2f221ed999ae11fafcc89a27c1d6f992d5ab5314add6d03d1112c6d564f93ec9b2014ecda"
}
```

Proof is:

```
{
    "raw_proof_file": "",
    "genesis_point": ""
}
```
